ygData.subject: RE: Star Rubies
ygData.msgSnippet: They are also in North Kaladim in the Everhot forge
ygData.messageBody:
They are also in North Kaladim in the Everhot forge

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Whitcraft,David [SMTP:DWHITCRAFT@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, August 10, 1999 1:45 PM
> To: 'EQCheats@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Star Rubies
>
> From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
>
> Star Rubies are available in Qeynos, Freeport, and outside Befallen at the
> shop. Range of prices between 70-120pp or so.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Michael Ott [mailto:mott@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, August 10, 1999 1:46 PM
> To: 'EQCheats@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Star Rubies
>
>
> From: Michael Ott <mott@...>
>
> Ive seen star rubies in some shops I believe there are some in either
> freeport queynos or kaladim
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Doug Sorensen
> [mailto:belgarth_of_surefall@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, July 28, 1999 12:22 PM
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Star Rubies
>
> From: Doug Sorensen <belgarth_of_surefall@...>
>
> Those are Rare gems, not purchasable. I haven't found
> any yet, but I would expect them to be on 35+
> creatures, maybe in Lower guk, etc..
>
> If anyone has more specific information, please post.
>
> Belgarth
>
> --- "Diina, David" <DDiina@...> wrote:
> > From: "Diina, David" <DDiina@...>
> >
> > Can anyone tell me where to buy STAR RUBIES or if
> > they are not merchant
> > items what mob drops them??? Thanx a lot
>
>
